info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 27 at 12:52PM EST by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...A BAND OF HEAVY LAKE ENHANCED SNOW WILL AFFECT PARTS OF ORLEANS...MONROE...AND NIAGARA COUNTIES... HAZARDS...A band of heavy lake enhanced snow accompanied by wind gusts of up to 40 MPH. Visibility will briefly drop to a quarter mile or less. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 1249 PM EST, a band of heavy lake enhanced snow was over Lake Ontario just offshore from Youngstown to Hilton, moving southeast at 35 mph. LOCATIONS IMPACTED INCLUDE... Greece, Lockport, Brockport, Medina, Albion, Hilton, Hamlin Beach State Park, Newfane, Spencerport, Youngstown, Middleport, Holley, Waterport, Lakeside Beach State Park, Fort Niagara State Park, Point Breeze, Kent, Ridgeway, Shelby and Clarendon. This includes the Lake Ontario State Parkway, Route 104, and the northern end of Route 390. SAFETY INFO... Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination. &&
